sqlMap.select: select t.ID, t.TEAM_ID,t.B_TEAM_ID,t.SCORE,t.B_SCORE,t.LEVEL_ID,t.RESULT,t.CREATED_TIME from TEAM_RECORD t where t.TEAM_ID=#fid#;
select t.ID, t.TEAM_ID,t.B_TEAM_ID,t.SCORE,t.B_SCORE,t.LEVEL_ID,t.RESULT,t.CREATED_TIME from TEAM_RECORD t where t.TEAM_ID=#fid# or t.B_TEAM_ID=#fid#;
sqlMap.insert:
insert into TEAM_RECORD(TEAM_ID,B_TEAM_ID,SCORE,B_SCORE,LEVEL_ID,RESULT,CREATED_TIME ) values( #teamId#, #bTeamId#, #score#, #bScore#, #levelId#, #result#, #createTime# );
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
sqlMap.update: update TEAM_RECORD t set t.TEAM_ID = #teamId#, t.B_TEAM_ID = #bTeamId#, t.SCORE = #score#, t.B_SCORE = #bScore#, t.LEVEL_ID = #levelId#, t.RESULT = #result#, t.CREATED_TIME = #createTime#, where t.ID = #id#
